Ingredients.4: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Peel and trim turnips. Then cut into 1-1/4 inch pieces and place into a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and season with thyme, salt, and pepper; toss until turnips are well coated. Spread out in 1 layer on a large baking sheet.

Directions.3: Roast for 15 minutes. Turn and roast until fork-tender and lightly browned, 10 to 15 more minutes.
